title: r/Relationships My Priest Blackmailed Me To Sleep With Him!
description: r/Relationships_Advice OP's fiancé is close friends with a priest. That priest gives OP some major creepy vibes. OP's fiancé convinces her to confide in the priest, so she does. Then, the priest turns around and uses the confessional to blackmail her into sleeping with him. "Either sleep with me, or I'll tell your fiancé what you confessed to me!"
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
